name: Shredder or detritivore presence
functionStatement: Organic matter is captured and broken down, fueling food webs, balancing production/ respiration, moderating pH/ redox, and supplying nutrients.
descriptionMarkdown: Quick checks show these invertebrates, indicating healthy detrital processing (if typical).
howToMeasureMarkdown: Conduct a rapid kick sample and note presence of shredder taxa where a CPOM pathway is expected.

levels.label: Optimal
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Several shredder taxa present where expected.

levels.label: Poor
levels.criteriaMarkdown: No shredders present where historically expected.

references: State biomonitoring portals and/or EPA Water Quality Portal biological results (where available).
